title: VC - Serious FX Training
description:
Serious FX Training
VFX Training for Adobe After Effects

Best-Selling After Effects Training DVD!
In this exciting end-to-end tutorial DVD, you'll discover real world techniques
and timesaving procedures not found in the manual. Each full-length video
tutorial covers a specific objective from start to finish.


01. Getting Started & New Features (15 min) 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Introduction to many new features
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Overview of After Effects 7.0
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Introduction to tools; such as Tracking, Parenting, 
Transfer Modes & Switches
--------------------------------------------------------
02. Basic Color Keying (13 min)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Learn to perform a clean key with DV footage 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Edge adjustments for green screen footage
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Comprehensive color correction techniques
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create shadows that follow talent 
--------------------------------------------------------

03. 3D Silhouette (36 min)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create human silhouette from live action footage 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Composite groups of people from 1 person
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create 3D Camera Moves
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Utilize multi-view workspace when 3D compositing
--------------------------------------------------------

04. Cruise Control (11 min)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create the illusion of a car driving 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Advanced compositing techniques
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Add realistic reflections & a light wrapping effect

--------------------------------------------------------

05. Creating Advanced Muzzle Fire (14:20 min)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create realistic Muzzle Fire with AE's built in tools
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create Flashes and learn to randomize effect
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Composite a smoke element with fire

06. Blown Away (25:30 min)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Composite actors in front of a large explosion

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Add a nice displacement scene effect
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Use parenting, null objects, and transfer modes

07. Floating Text (9:15 min)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Advanced 4-point motion tracking
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create the look of 3D tracking inside AE
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Make text appear to be floating over video
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Technique works on less stable footage
--------------------------------------------------------

08. DVD Menu Creation I & II (27:15 & 12: min)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create a DVD Menu with transitions
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Advanced use of the fractal noise filter 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Basic tour of Encore
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create button transitions during authoring
--------------------------------------------------------

09. The Teleporter (12:15 min)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Composite character onto background
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Use an opacity track matte with the fractal noise
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Overlay pre-rendered particle effect

10. Selective Color Correction (12:15 min) 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Increase color density in specific areas 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Motion Track footage to fix certain areas
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fix slightly overexposed Footage
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Use subtraction masks to get desired effects
